```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)

year=paste("2018:2023") #this doesn't seem to filter
authors="Maria A Doyle"
my_query=getRefs(authors,year)

# filter for last 5 years

my_query <- my_query[list(date = paste0(year_from,"/"))]

# output to file so can use in yaml header bibliography field above
WriteBib(my_query, file="maria.bib")
```
